processing.text: select '' as message, 'this.frameElement.result = @@result;parent.set$Toolbar&Identity;$ImportResult(this.frameElement);' as script select *, cast('' as varchar(32)) as ma_vt2 into #result from @@table update #result set thue_suat = dbo.ff_GetTaxCode2TaxRate(ma_thue) update #result set ma_vt2 = a.ma_vt from dmvt a with(nolock) where a.ten_vt = #result.ten_vt select * from #result order by stt return
